SQL.LOAD: SELECT web_service_name, on_line_id, off_line_message, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, last_operation_date, webservice_id FROM elp_webservices WHERE webservice_id = :webservice_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT webservice_id, web_service_name, on_line_id, GetCodeFromListItem(on_line_id) on_line, off_line_message, case when last_operation_date is null then null else (select USER_NAME from ELP_USER where NETWORK_ID = w.modified_by) end as last_change_by, last_operation_date FROM elp_webservices w --dynamic_where_clause order by web_service_name
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_webservices SET web_service_name = :web_service_name, on_line_id = :on_line_id, off_line_message = :off_line_message, last_operation_date = :last_operation_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE webservice_id = :webservice_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_webservices ( web_service_name, on_line_id, off_line_message, created_by, webservice_id, last_operation_date ) VALUES ( :web_service_name, :on_line_id, :off_line_message, :created_by, :webservice_id, :last_operation_date )
